content: If you are looking to implement the FHIR based iTK specification for "Transfer of Care", "GP Connect" or "Digital Medicines" then the library at https://www.nuget.org/packages/ClaroTech.NHSITK/ may be of use. Details on how to use it are at http://clarotech.co.uk/products/library-fhir-itk/
I decided to open source this code over at https://github.com/clarotech/NHSITKLibrary Feel free to help out - pull requests accepted
